summary:
### Summary of GitHub Activity for BuidlGuidl/grants.buidlguidl.com in August 2025

- **Major Features and Improvements:**
  - Implemented an API call to mark SRE builds as BG-granted upon grant completion (#150).
  - Added functionality to link to builds in the user interface when grants are submitted or completed (#149).
  - Updated data fetching for builders and user roles to utilize the SRE API instead of outdated Firebase data (#148).
  - Adjusted grant amounts in response to changes in ETH price, lowering from 0.15 to 0.08 (#147).

- **Bug Fixes:**
  - No significant bug fixes were reported this month.

- **Overall Themes:**
  - Focus on enhancing user experience through improved linking and data accuracy.
  - Adaptation to external changes, such as ETH price fluctuations and data source migrations.

topPRs.title: Mark SRE build as BG-granted when a grant is completed
Add link to the build when submitted or completed
Fetch builders and user roles data from SRE
Lower grant amount according to new eth price 0.15 => 0.08
